docs.text: Golem Python API How to use Rendering from yapapi.runner import Engine , Task , vm from datetime import timedelta async def main (): package = await vm . repo ( image_hash = "ef007138617985ebb871e4305bc86fc97073f1ea9ab0ade9ad492ea995c4bc8b" , min_mem_gib = 0.5 , min_storage_gib = 2.0 , ) async def worker ( ctx , tasks ): ctx . send_file ( "./scene.blend" , "/golem/resource/scene.blend" ) async for task in tasks : frame = task . data ctx . begin () crops = [ { "outfilebasename" : "out" , "borders_x" : [ 0.0 , 1.0 ], "borders_y" : [ 0.0 , 1.0 ], } ] ctx . send_json ( "/golem/work/params.json" , { "scene_file" : "/golem/resource/scene.blend" , "resolution" : ( 800 , 600 ), "use_compositing" : False , "crops" : crops , "samples" : 100 , "frames" : [ frame ], "output_format" : "PNG" , "RESOURCES_DIR" : "/golem/resources" , "WORK_DIR" : "/golem/work" , "OUTPUT_DIR" : "/golem/output" , }, ) ctx . run ( "/golem/entrypoints/render_entrypoint.py" ) ctx . download_file ( "/golem/output/out.png" , f "output_ { frame } .png" ) yield ctx . commit () # TODO: Check if job is valid # and reject by: task.reject_task(msg = 'invalid file') task . accept_task () ctx . log ( "no more frame to render" ) async with Engine ( package = package , max_worker = 10 , budget = 10.0 , timeout = timedelta ( minutes = 5 ) ) as engine : async for progress in engine . map ( worker , [ Task ( data = frame ) for frame in range ( 1 , 101 )] ): print ( "progress=" , progress )

docs.text: Rendering from yapapi.runner import Engine , Task , vm from datetime import timedelta async def main (): package = await vm . repo ( image_hash = "ef007138617985ebb871e4305bc86fc97073f1ea9ab0ade9ad492ea995c4bc8b" , min_mem_gib = 0.5 , min_storage_gib = 2.0 , ) async def worker ( ctx , tasks ): ctx . send_file ( "./scene.blend" , "/golem/resource/scene.blend" ) async for task in tasks : frame = task . data ctx . begin () crops = [ { "outfilebasename" : "out" , "borders_x" : [ 0.0 , 1.0 ], "borders_y" : [ 0.0 , 1.0 ], } ] ctx . send_json ( "/golem/work/params.json" , { "scene_file" : "/golem/resource/scene.blend" , "resolution" : ( 800 , 600 ), "use_compositing" : False , "crops" : crops , "samples" : 100 , "frames" : [ frame ], "output_format" : "PNG" , "RESOURCES_DIR" : "/golem/resources" , "WORK_DIR" : "/golem/work" , "OUTPUT_DIR" : "/golem/output" , }, ) ctx . run ( "/golem/entrypoints/render_entrypoint.py" ) ctx . download_file ( "/golem/output/out.png" , f "output_ { frame } .png" ) yield ctx . commit () # TODO: Check if job is valid # and reject by: task.reject_task(msg = 'invalid file') task . accept_task () ctx . log ( "no more frame to render" ) async with Engine ( package = package , max_worker = 10 , budget = 10.0 , timeout = timedelta ( minutes = 5 ) ) as engine : async for progress in engine . map ( worker , [ Task ( data = frame ) for frame in range ( 1 , 101 )] ): print ( "progress=" , progress )
